rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg001
rows.name:
This looks like as good a place
as any to have a proper chat.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg006
rows.name: So, what did you want to discuss?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg007
rows.name:
Well, listen, Meleph...
What do you think of me?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg002
rows.name:
Forgive me, Saika, but I'm not
sure I understand the question.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg003
rows.name:
Well, um, I was wondering...
Do you think I'm feminine enough?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg008
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg004
rows.name: I think you're a lovely young woman.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg005
rows.name: Are you coming on to me?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg101
rows.name:
Relax. You're a very lovely
young woman.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg102
rows.name:
Well I mean, I'm sure most women
look feminine and cute next to you,
Meleph, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg103
rows.name: Are you trying to insult me?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg104
rows.name:
N-no, not at all!
Sorry, I'm not good with words...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg105
rows.name: ...Hmph.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg106
rows.name:
But, don't you think I'm kind of plain
next to Homura and Kagutsuchi's charm?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg107
rows.name:
It's true that the two of them do have
a certain healthy femininity about them.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg108
rows.name: Right?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg120
rows.name:
I feel like I need more
charm to be more feminine.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg109
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg121
rows.name:
And you thought I must know all the
tips and tricks to be sexy.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg110
rows.name:
No, no, I wouldn't come to
you for that kind of advice!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg111
rows.name: It's just...you are like a man, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg113
rows.name:
So, I figured you probably have
a good idea of how men think.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg114
rows.name:
...Hahahah.
I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg115
rows.name: Yeah, I knew you'd understand!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg116
rows.name:
So tell me, from your point of view,
what have Kagutsuchi and Homura
got that I haven't?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg117
rows.name:
Forget it!
We're done here!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg118
rows.name:
Huh?!
Wait a sec, Meleph!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg119
rows.name:
Weren't you gonna help me?!
Oh, come on, you're such a tease!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg220
rows.name: W-wait a second...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg201
rows.name:
You know I'm a woman,
right, Saika?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg202
rows.name:
That's why I can't just
accept your feelings...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg203
rows.name:
*giggle*
Oh, Meleph, you're face is red.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg221
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg204
rows.name: Everyone knows you're a woman.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg222
rows.name:
I wasn't confessing my love or
anything. I just wanted to ask
you about my femininity.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg205
rows.name:
Really? You came to ask
me about femininity?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg206
rows.name:
You dress like a dude but you're so
pretty. You must know a thing or two.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg223
rows.name:
Your hair, your skin, your nails...
Always so on point.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg207
rows.name:
You have better eyes than
I gave you credit for.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg208
rows.name:
I just notice that stuff. I'm a
girl Blade, after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg224
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg225
rows.name:
Sounds like there's some man that
you want to notice you, Saika.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg209
rows.name: No no no! Nothing like that!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg226
rows.name:
I was just watching you and Kagutsuchi,
and wondered what kind of stuff
adult women do to look so feminine.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg210
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg211
rows.name: No word of a lie!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg212
rows.name: Heh.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg227
rows.name:
Both Kagutsuchi and myself import
Elastifying Tonic and Freshening
Gel specially from Avaritia.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg213
rows.name: Mm hmm.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg228
rows.name:
Divine Beast-Oil Hand Cream also
comes in very useful.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg214
rows.name: I see, I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg215
rows.name:
I'll ask Zeke if he can buy
some for you too, in future.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg216
rows.name: What?! No, don't do that!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg218
rows.name: Let's keep this on the down-low, okay?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg219
rows.name: Nobody needs to know!
